content: copyright © greenletterday llc 2022 all rights reserved www greenletterday com abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet cluster refers to 3 double_crochet in a single stitch/gap notes this blanket starts with 180 stitches you can add width by adding more stitches in multiples of 3 ex chain 192 stitches plus 1 instructions chain 180 stitches plus 1 and turn row 1 single_crochet in each stitch across chain 2 and turn row 2 1 double_crochet in 2nd stitch from end *skip next 2 stitches 3 double_crochet we ll call this a double_crochet cluster from here on out in next stitch* repeat across until the last 4 stitches skip 2 stitches 1 double_crochet in the last 2 stitches chain 2 and turn row 3 double_crochet cluster in each gap across until the last two stitches skip 1 stitch 1 double_crochet in the last stitch chain 2 and turn row 4 1 double_crochet in first stitch of double_crochet cluster from previous row double_crochet cluster in each gap across until the last 4 stitches skip 2 stitches 1 double_crochet in the last 2 stitches repeat row 3 and 4 until end finish the blanket with a row of single_crochet in each stitch copyright © greenletterday llc 2022 all rights reserved www greenletterday com
